Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl

Class ContactServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.ContactServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContactService
@Service public class ContactServiceImpl extends Object implements ContactService
Implementation of the ContactService interface for managing contacts.

  • Method Details

    • createContacts

      public List<Contact> createContacts(List<CreateContactDTO> contacts)
      Creates contacts and manages their subscriptions. This method validates the provided contact data and checks for duplicates. If a contact value already exists, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      createContacts in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      contacts - A list of CreateContactDTO objects to create.
      Returns:
      A list of successfully created Contact objects.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a duplicate contact value exists.

    • mapFromContactEntityToModel

      public Contact mapFromContactEntityToModel(ContactEntity contactEntity)
      Maps a ContactEntity to a Contact model.
      Parameters:
      contactEntity - the ContactEntity to map from.
      Returns:
      a Contact model populated with data from the provided ContactEntity.

    • getContacts

      public List<Contact> getContacts(Boolean active, String search, ContactType contactType)
      Retrieves a list of contacts, with optional filters for active status, search string, and contact type.
      Specified by:
      getContacts in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      active - boolean filter
      search - optional search string
      contactType - optional filter to retrieve by type
      Returns:
      a list of contacts that match the provided filters

    • getContactsByListOfIds

      public List<Contact> getContactsByListOfIds(List<Long> ids)
      Retrieves a list of contacts based on the provided list of contact IDs.
      Specified by:
      getContactsByListOfIds in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      ids - the list of contact IDs to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of Contact objects that correspond to the given IDs

    • getContact

      public Contact getContact(Long id)
      Retrieves a contact by its unique identifier.
      Specified by:
      getContact in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the contact
      Returns:
      the contact with the specified id (currently returns null)

    • updateContact

      Updates an existing contact.
      Specified by:
      updateContact in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      value - the contact with updated details
      id - refers to the entity to update
      Returns:
      the updated contact

    • deleteContact

      public void deleteContact(Long id)
      Deletes a contact by its unique identifier.
      Specified by:
      deleteContact in interface ContactService
      Parameters:

    • deactivateContact

      public boolean deactivateContact(Long contactId)
      Dectivates a contact by marking it as inactive.
      Specified by:
      deactivateContact in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      contactId - the ID of the contact to deactivate.
      Returns:
      true if the contact was succesfully deactivated, false otherwise.

    • deactivateContactsFromList

      public boolean deactivateContactsFromList(List<Long> contactIds)
      Deactivates a list of contacts by marking them as inactive.
      Specified by:
      deactivateContactsFromList in interface ContactService
      Parameters:
      contactIds - list of contact IDs to deactivate
      Returns:
      true if all contacts were successfully deactivated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any error occurs during deactivation
